name: Robot wants to Leave
description:
R. Wants to Leave

You're a little robot who wants to leave his work office, but your boss doesn't want to, and he will not let you leave easily...

RwtL is a jam-style game I made in a week for fun. 

The  actual build is a small demo, I maybe will continue the development later. 

Share my your opinion about my game!

(You need a Keyboard to play! )

More of my games here: https://smevisulien.wixsite.com/mygames
